nodes.text: MF-80 was Gardulla Besadii the Elder's protocol droid during the Clone Wars. When Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Quinlan Vos went to Nal Hutta in order to talk to the Hutt Grand Council, MF-80 was present and translated the conversation between her master and the two Jedi. Her metal plating had a two-color scheme.

MF-80 was voiced by Angelique Perrin, who also portrayed Jedi Master Adi Gallia and Mama the Hutt in The Clone Wars TV series. She replaced TC-70, Jabba Desijilic Tiure's protocol droid, who was originally intended to appear.
